relation: This is my first time submitting a non-pixel picture. It shows Hinawa sending Flint a letter.
Claus is the c(l)ause of all the mess in the room. The picture behind Claus features the two common smiles most kids use: the half-hearted smile, and the pain smile. I tried my best on shading. :)
Yeah, yeah, they're out in the middle of nowhere, I get that! Anyway, Lucas is (Earthbound) Tessie, Claus is Santa, and Fuel is the ULTIMATE CHIMERA!
m3pixel - #01 This is the first page to my Mother 3 comic series. It's kind of a goofy comic, but I like it anyway. :)
m3pixel - #02 I'm pretty bad at drawing men, aren't I?
